Title: Silent Microscope
Description: Made in GameMaker and developed in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2020 (the theme for the jam was 'Repair')
The objective is to fix bad solder joints using a timing mechanic, the player is scored by how much time they took to find and repair all solder points.
Has keyboard+mouse and controller support, being able to be played with one hand. This was made with player accessibility in mind.
All own-made assets made during the jam duration.
